channel.title: Webclient IP?
channel.description:
Heey all, I cant figure out about the webclient. The Webclient needs to run on the server ip(Hosted Ip) And on what ip i need to run the server? Because some server+client you cant change the server ip in the server only in the client. Anyone explain it please.
Thanks Admigo

item.title: Webclient IP?
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“admigo, post:3, topic:443820”]If you look the webclient Tutorials they say nothing about the server ips.
And look at this server+client : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,545998.0.html
You can edit the client ip but not the server ip from the server where you run it.[/quote]
You don’t put your ip in the webclient html, you put the server IP in the client then you jar the client. You don’t have to put the IP in the server. Basic java, learn it!

Read full topic
